com.squareup.picasso
Class RequestBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.squareup.picasso.RequestBuilder

public class RequestBuilder
extends Object

Fluent API for building an image download request.

Method Detail

placeholder

public RequestBuilder placeholder(int placeholderResId)
A placeholder drawable to be used while the image is being loaded. If the requested image is not immediately available in the memory cache then this resource will be set on the target ImageView.

placeholder

public RequestBuilder placeholder(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable placeholderDrawable)
A placeholder drawable to be used while the image is being loaded. If the requested image is not immediately available in the memory cache then this resource will be set on the target ImageView.

error

public RequestBuilder error(int errorResId)
An error drawable to be used if the request image could not be loaded.

error

public RequestBuilder error(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable errorDrawable)
An error drawable to be used if the request image could not be loaded.

fit

public RequestBuilder fit()
Attempt to resize the image to fit exactly into the target ImageView's bounds. This will only have an affect if the target view has been measured when the image becomes available.

resizeDimen

public RequestBuilder resizeDimen(int targetWidthResId,
                                  int targetHeightResId)
Resize the image to the specified dimension size.

resize

public RequestBuilder resize(int targetWidth,
                             int targetHeight)
Resize the image to the specified size in pixels.

centerCrop

public RequestBuilder centerCrop()
Crops an image inside of the bounds specified by resize(int, int) rather than distorting the aspect ratio. This cropping technique scales the image so that it fills the requested bounds and then crops the extra.

scale

public RequestBuilder scale(float factor)
Scale the image using the specified factor.

scale

public RequestBuilder scale(float factorX,
                            float factorY)
Scale the image using the specified factors.

rotate

public RequestBuilder rotate(float degrees)
Rotate the image by the specified degrees.

rotate

public RequestBuilder rotate(float degrees,
                             float pivotX,
                             float pivotY)
Rotate the image by the specified degrees around a pivot point.

transform

public RequestBuilder transform(Transformation transformation)
Add a custom transformation to be applied to the image.

Custom transformations will always be run after the built-in transformations.

skipCache

public RequestBuilder skipCache()
Indicate that this request should not use the memory cache for attempting to load or save the image. This is useful for when you know an image will only ever be used once (e.g., loading an image from the filesystem and uploading to a remote server).

noFade

public RequestBuilder noFade()
Disable brief fade in of images loaded from the disk cache or network.

get

public android.graphics.Bitmap get()
                            throws IOException
Synchronously fulfill this request. Must not be called from the main thread.

Throws:
IOException

fetch

public void fetch(Target target)
Asynchronously fulfills the request into the specified Target.

Note: This method keeps a strong reference to the Target instance.

into

public void into(Target target)
Asynchronously fulfills the request into the specified Target.

Note: This method keeps a weak reference to the Target instance and will automatically support object recycling.

into

public void into(android.widget.ImageView target)
Asynchronously fulfills the request into the specified ImageView.

This method keeps a weak reference to the view and will automatically support object recycling.
